actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to return the remains of Second Lt. John A. Ellard Jr., from the Manila American Cemetery, Republic of the Philippines, to the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to return the remains of Second Lt. John A. Ellard Jr., from the Manila American Cemetery, Republic of the Philippines, to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to return the remains of Second Lt. John A. Ellard Jr., from the Manila American Cemetery, Republic of the Philippines, to the United States.
